description: Elrond is a memecoin created to celebrate the OG culture of the MultiversX blockchain, formerly known as the Elrond Network. It pays tribute to those who were there from the very beginning—the pioneers who believed in the vision and helped shape its history. Combining humor, nostalgia, and innovation, Elrond embodies the spirit of an authentic and passionate community. This project, both a nod to the past and a step toward the future, invites OGs and newcomers alike to rediscover Elrond’s legacy with a fun and accessible twist.
